choices: The teacher gives you to one of the other students.
The teacher keeps you at her desk.
Some of the students have questions about you.
1.content:
Kieran stood at the front of the classroom, atop the teacher's desk.

"Why don't you tell us a bit about yourself" says Mrs. Brown.

Kieran gulped nervously. He could feel the eyes of everybody watching him. They were gigantic compared to him, utter goddesses. Their looks consisted of curiosity, wonder, disgust, awe and excitement. He felt weak and vulnerable. He didn't want to come here. He had begged his mother to allow him to stay home-schooled, but she insisted that it would allow him to finally have a social life and meet new people. He was so nervous.

"H-Hello. My name is K-Kieran McLoughlin. I-I was born w-with a c-c-condition that made me o-only t-t-two inches t-t-tall" he said, shyly. "I-I hope to b-b-be good f-f-friends" he added.

"Very good, Kieran" said Mrs. Brown. "Now..."
1.title: Introduction

11.content:
"Now, which one of you girls want to be his caretaker? Due to his small size, he will need help getting from class to class and such" says Mrs. Brown.

A few hands shoot in the air. Who will the teacher pick?
11.title: Who is it?

choices: The class goes on without interruptions
111.content:
"I'll take care of him" said Heather excitedly, sitting at the back of the class with her hand raised.

"Sure. Kieran, you'll be going with Heather" said Mrs. Brown. She picked him up and brought him over to Heather's desk before placing him back down. Heather was a young christian girl with dirty blond hair and glasses. Kieran looked up nervously at the beautiful face before him. She was absolutely gorgeous. However, Kieran was still scared, due to her massive size compared to him. The teacher began the lesson and Heather turned her attention towards her new little friend.

"Hey there, little Kieran" she cooed quietly, smiling down at him. To her, he looked like the most adorable thing she'd ever seen. "Don't be scared, I won't hurt you. You're far too adorable for anyone to hurt you".

Kieran blushed, feeling slightly comforted.
111.title: A Holy Goddess

choices: She decides to tease you about it.
1111.content:
After class ends, it's time for a fifteen minute break. After the break, you go to your next class. Kieran and Heather enjoy their break in the student lounge, getting to know each-other. Suddenly, Heather's stomach growls, which startles Kieran. Due to his size, what sounded like a small gurgle to Heather, sounded like thunder to him. He looks up nervously at her.

She giggles. "Don't worry. I'm not gonna eat you" she says. "Or will I?" she continues, giggling as she lifts you up to her face.
1111.title: Time for a Break

choices: She's not into it, but accepts your opinion.
She's one of THOSE christians who thinks that rock and metal are satanic.
11111.content:
"I don't doubt you'd be delicious" she said, opening her mouth and showing it off. Kieran squirmed, scared that she was gonna eat him. She laughs and drops the act, placing Kieran back down on her lap.

"Oh, calm down. It's just a joke. You'd have to be really messed up in the head in order to eat someone, tiny or not".

She grabs an apple out of her lunch bag and begins eating it. Kieran sighs in relief that she wasn't going to eat him. His little sister had tried to eat him countless times, which had seriously traumatized him. His mom always stopped her, but it still deeply affected him. It was his biggest fear. He shook his head and decided to change the subject.

"S-So, w-what are your h-hobbies" he asked her.

She smiled. "Well, I like to watch movies quite a bit. I also enjoy listening to music and drawing".

"T-That's c-cool" he replied. "W-What kind of m-music do you l-l-listen to".

"Country, gospel, classical. Stuff like that. What about you" she asks.

"I usually listen to classic rock, metal, punk and things like that" he replied.

What does she think of that
11111.title: A Harmless Prank

choices: After a short pause she sighs. "We are going..."
111113.content:
Her face changed, the smile fading as if never there.

"...Metal?" She spits the word like a curse, her pristine face looking at him unfriendly. The expression unfitting of her angelic figure.

"W-w-wha's the problem?" He asked shakingly.

"How can you listin to... To something like THAT? Don't you feel ashamed? At all?" Her voice losing all traces of warmth.

With panic for a face, Kieran tells her the truth: "N-n-no?" His voice timid and pitiful.

Silence.

"...I see." Putting the lunch away, she takes him off her comfortable thighs.

"W-w-where are we going?!" His voice higher then a little girl.

Silence.
111113.title: She's one of THOSE christians who thinks th...

choices: She has other plans...(Or/and shows mercy)
1111131.content:
"Do you truly not repant?" Her voice dangerously calm.

"W-w-w-what are you talking about???"

She brought him to her face. Her face angelic but eyes... Kieran gulped heavily. "...H-heather?" Her breath blew his hair, the smell surprsingly sweet.

"My father listined to it..." Her voice melancholic.

"Ooh."

"...When beating my mom." The tone turning stone cold.

"W-woah, I'm s-sorry..." Kieran murmured, his face of shame. Now that he understood she just wanted to tell him a story, his fear disappeared. Only know could he truly marvel her face.The more he looked, the more mesmarized he became. Her soft breath tingeling his skin. He blushed slightly.

"He wasn't always like that, no. The process starts small. Watching edgy videos, reading atheist articles or... Listining to T H I S." She looked at him solemnly.

"Heed my warning! Repent..." Suddenly her gaze fall on his crotch.

"Y-you!" Her voice as if violated, cheeks blushed and face twisting angrily.

"H-huh?" He noticed his bulge, getting red.

"I-I-I-I-I hav... I...?!" His whole body shaking, his mind a chaos.

Abruptly, her face became deadly calm. Her eyes flashing dangerously.

"M-m-misunderstanding..."

"Do you remember when you asked where are we going?" Her voice like antarctica.

"Y-y-yes?" He looked at her puzzlingly.

She looked down at him, her stomach growling. "'WE' aren't going anywhere..."

He looked down to the sounds origin. Her slim waist like a mountain. He shook, remembering the pinkish walls of his sister's mouth, realizing he could easily end up dissapearing inside her belly.

"...But YOU are going down my stomach." Her lips spread, showing the slimy insides.

Kieran as if experiencing a vietnam flashback. Before he could say anything, she sucked him inside, his world becoming pink. Hot, hot like in a Jacuzzi, her salvia enveloping his whole body, her bodily odor assulting his nose.

Heather moved him left and right. Her face determinated.

His clothes slided by themselves, his naked body in contact with her tongue, his sweat mixing with her saliva.

"AAAAAAAACH!" Kieran screamed hauntingly. "HEATHER! H-H-HEATHER W-AIT!" His dick thrust against her delicate flesh, if not for the horror, the situation would be quite pleasurable.

Heather turned red, feeling his naked body fill her mouth. Her teeth grit, almost snapping him in half.

"Wonder if you'll be so excited down in my tummy." She spat the words.
1111131.title: Stomach.

11111311.content:
Heather's mouth was the most terrifying place Kieran had ever been. It was so warm and slimy. Her massive teeth loomed above, threatening to slice him into bits.

"HEATHER!! HEATHER, PLEASE!!" he screamed.

After about a minute, Heather tilted her head back and with a loud gulp, she sent Kieran on his way to her stomach. She sighed.

"I'm sorry it had to be this way, sinner" she said, patting her stomach.

Soon, the bell rang and it was time for her next class.

The journey down her esophagus was long and agonizing. It was so tight that Kieran felt like he was going be squished or end up popping from the pressure. His limbs were bent in ways that didn't seem natural. He could hear the sound of her rhythmic heartbeat as well as the sounds of Heather going about the rest of her schoolday. Eventually, he was squeezed through a tight sphincter and dropped into the cavernous, hellscape that was Heather's stomach. It gurgled and groaned, welcoming its new meal. The low pH caused Kieran's nose to sting. He couldn't breathe. The acids slowly began to work on his tiny naked body. He desperately tried to get out, pounding on the stomach walls and pleading for his life.

"HEATHER!!! HEATHER!! PLEASE LET ME OUT!!! I DON'T WANNA DIE!!!" he cried, to no avail.
11111311.title: The Number of the Beast

111113111.content:
By the time school had ended, Kieran was already nothing more than gory and bloody soup inside Heather's stomach, ready to be used as nutrition for her young body. Before she went to sleep that night, she began her nightly prayers.

"In the name of the Father, the Son, and the Holy Spirit, Amen" she said. "Wonderful God, I pray that you you will forgive the sinner from today as he did not know what he was doing. I pray that his soul shall go to heaven and that he shall learn to worship you as I have".

She continued praying for the next few minutes until she finally went to bed. Kieran was now a part of her.
111113111.title: A Sacrifice to a Goddess

11111312.content:
She thrusted him around her mouth for a while. Unlike her words, her face was anything but hesitant. Meantime, Kieran gripped her slimy tongue. He looked back, observing the abyss that was her throat: the faint growling of her stomach like an ancient beast, ready to pounce anytime.
Kieran suddenly shifted. Saliva gathered around him, her lower jaw moving dangerously.
"N-N-N-NOOO!" Kieran cried, waving his arms desperately as he was swallowed down, the pink walls flashing around him but just as he was about to go down her stomach, his body froze, his legs waving in her throat...
"M-Mercy... Heather..." He pleaded. His body was moved again, to her mouth's center. Kieran was about to sigh with relief but suddenly felt a movement: his face panicked, before changing into a question mark.
"H-Heather?" He whispered questioningly. She was clearly walking somewhere... Kieran rested, lying in her mouth, his body sweating slightly, the temperature hotter then in sauna and as wet as in a pool. His sweat morphing with her salvia and swallowed, soon entering her stomach, a part of her for all times. Kieran gritted his teeth, trying to find courage to speak.
"H-H-Heather? C-C-Can y-y-you let me out?" His plead falling on deaf ears, pressuring him like a boulder. Unable to find anymore courage, his simply lied there, shaking slightly, trying to enjoy the possibly last moments of his life with wry, nervous smile. She was really beautiful. He recalled her appearance again, subconsciously turning himself on. His cheeks reddened... Yet, remembering their conversation brought him shame, still, he could not bring himself to say sorry. Merely lying there, her tongue pleasuring his little one.


/CHOICE 1: What he did not know, was that Heather was going to her twin sister for advice: The one called by many a "Devil in Christ suit", a true troublemaker...

/CHOICE 2: What he did not know, was that Heather was going to her "friends" for advice...
11111312.title: ...Not in a stomach... Yet...

choices: Kieran wakes up later, still in Heather's pocket
Kieran wakes up later, on the floor with Heather and other girls surrounding him
A girl saw what Heather did and came to save you
111113122.content:
Eventually, Heather spat him out onto her hand. "Listen here, you heathen" she said in a hushed voice so no one else would hear her but you. "For the rest of the day, you will stay with me, in my pocket. You will not speak unless I tell you to. Tonight, my friends and I will be having a slumber party. We'll decide what to do with you then" she explained.

Kieran was shaking in fear the whole time she was talking. The girl who he once saw as a beautiful angel from Heaven was now his worst nightmare. He was on the verge of tears.

Heather moved him over to one of her jean pockets and placed him inside. Exhausted from what he'd experienced thus far, Kieran soon passed out...
111113122.title: Wet party. . .

choices: Cydnee, a music nerd and a guitarist
1111131223.content:
Heather had just put Kieran in her pocket when another girl came up to her.

"I saw what you did to him, Heather" she said. "That was very cruel".

"He listened to devil music and got hard looking at me" replied Heather. "He deserved it".

"Did Jesus ever punish sinners?!" said the girl in rebuttal. "Did not not give food to the poor, have dinner with prostitutes and heal the sick?!"

Heather stood there, not knowing how to respond.

"If you continue to hurt him, you'll be just as guilty as the Romans who crucified your precious lord and savior!" said the girl. She then dug her hand into Heather's pocket and fished Kieran out before running away, leaving Heather standing there shocked.

Later on, Kieran wakes up and sees the face of his rescuer.

"Thank god, you're alive" she said.

"W-Who are you" asked Kieran.

"My name is ______"
1111131223.title: Mysterious Rescuer

choices: It's her sister, Liz, wanting to meet Kieran.
It's her parents calling her downstairs for supper.
11111312231.content:
"My name is Rebecca" she said. "What's yours".

"M-M-My name is K-Kieran" he replied, nervously. He looked around the room. "W-W-Where am I?" he asked her.

"You're at my place. You were unconscious throughout the entire rest of the school day, so I took you home with me. I told the teachers about Heather and they had you switched over to me"

"W-Won't your parents be concerned about having me over here?" he asked. "What about my mom?".

"Well, as for my parents, my mom is a teacher at the school. My sister is very happy to have you here. She's the kind of girl who will think that anything smaller than her is cute. As for your family, I don't know much but my mom said something about your mom wanting to keep you away from your sister".

Kieran gave a weak smile. So, that was the reason his Mom had sent him there. It was to keep him away from being eaten by his sister. He smiled weakly, knowing that his mom truly had good intentions in her heart. He was still sad that he likely wouldn't be living with her again.

His thoughts are interrupted by a voice outside the door.

"Rebecca?".

Who is it?
11111312231.title: An Angel's Smile

1111132.content:
"We are going to the bathroom" she sighed, "for your punishment"

"What!?" Kieran yells.

Heather smirks, places you in her pocket, and begins walking towards the bathroom.

You are suddenly plucked out of her pocket and watch her undress her panties in the bathroom stall

"What are you doing!?" Kieran questioned

"Preparing your punishment, you are going to be my toy" she responded.

Kieran goes to object, but before he can say a word he's picked up and...
1111132.title: The Punishment

choices: The class is planning a play based on 'David and Goliath' with Kieran as David.
11112.content:
Soon, the bell rings and it's time for the next class, Christian Ethics. It was an elective course for religious students looking to learn more about their faith. Heather, being a Christian, had obviously chosen to take part in it.

Kieran wasn't incredibly religious. He wasn't against religion, in fact he was baptized in the Catholic Church when he was one year old. However, as he grew older and learned more, he began to form his own opinions about religion and about how things work. First of all, a lot of Christians and Catholics are against LGBTQ+, which Kieran sees as wrong. In Kieran's philosophy, as long as nobody is hurting one another, they're free to like what they want to like.

(Author's Note: This is also what I believe IRL. I support everybody as long as you're not hurting anyone.)

Once they got to the classroom, Kieran reintroduced himself to this new group of people and then rejoined Heather at her desk.

What happens next?
11112.title: Forget about it.

1112.content:
At one point, the teacher leaves class to attend to some business. As you would expect, the students use this time to begin talking to each-other. Kieran and Heather are enjoying themselves and getting to know each other when another girl approaches.

"Hey, Heather" she said.

"Oh, hey, Ashley" replied Heather.

"You know you're not allowed to have food in class, right?" said Ashley, eyeing Kieran.

He quickly ran towards Heather for safety, scared of what this other woman would do to him.

"What are you talking about? Kieran isn't food!" she retorted, placing her hands around Kieran protectively.

"Sure looks tasty to me" replied Ashley, licking her lips. "Why do you even care for it? It's not human. It's not like he's worth anything".

"Of course he's human"

"Oh really? Why's he so small then? It's not like he has any rights. He's worth little more than a bug. The most worth he'd ever have would be as food".

Heather was absolutely disgusted with what Ashley was saying. Her and Ashley were usually friends, but today that was changing with the discovery of how little Ashley cared for others.

"Go away, Ashley! Now!" she said.

"Fine! See ya later, religious freak" said Ashley, as she walked away.

Once Ashley was gone, Heather turned to Kieran. "I'm sorry about that, little guy" she said, petting him with her finger. "Just ignore her. She doesn't know what she's talking about".

Kieran blushed and sighed nervously. "O-O-Okay. Thank you, H-Heather".

Soon, the teacher comes back and class continues until the bell rings, after which, it's time for...
1112.title: A Seductive Demon Approaches

choices: She doesn't give you a choice
112.content:
"I'll have him" said Maggie, a young girl with black hair, wearing a T-Shirt of Mt. Lady from My Hero Academia.

"Sure. Kieran, you'll be going with Maggie" said the teacher, taking him over to Maggie's desk and setting him down. Once he was on her desk, he looked up at the woman in front of him. She was stunning.

Maggie reached over to grab Kieran. He yelped in surprise as he was lifted off the ground, held up to her face. She giggled, poking and examining him, as if he was a toy.

"You are so cool!" she whispered excitedly. "I've always wanted to have my own little tiny person. I never knew people like you were real!" she added.

Kieran blushed and chuckled to himself. "W-Well, t-thanks for t-t-the compliment". However, he was nowhere near expecting her next sentence.

"Would you like to be my little pet?" she asked, giggling.
112.title: Mt. Maggie

1121.content:
"Yay! Thank you so much" she whispered happily.

"Maggie! Kieran! I'm happy that you're becoming friends, but please try to focus on the lesson" said the teacher.

"Yes, Mrs. Brown" they both said.

Eventually class ended and it was time for...
1121.title: A Willing Pet

11211.content:
"Alright, little buddy" she said. "Next on the list is Gym class"

"O-Okay" he said, nervously.

Maggie carried Kieran into the locker room and set him down on the bench.

"No peeking while I'm getting changed" she said, chuckling.

"O-Of course" he replied, turning around.

Being so small, he didn't have his own gym clothes. He didn't even have 'normal' clothes. He'd been wearing doll clothes all his life. Therefore, he simply stood there, waiting for Maggie to be done changing.

"There we go" she said, as she finished changing. "You can turn around now".

Kieran turned around and saw Maggie with her gym clothes. She still looked beautiful.

"Don't you have gym clothes too?" asked Maggie.

"No" he replied. "I don't even have 'normal' clothes. These are doll clothes".

Maggie giggled. "Awe, that's adorable" she cooed. Kieran simply cringed.

The two entered the gymnasium with the rest of the girls. The coach, Mrs. Lanovaz was waiting for them.

"Alright, class. As you may or may not know, we have a new student today. Where is he?".

"Right here" said Kieran, yelling so she could hear him.

"Okay, good" she said, gently taking Kieran from Maggie. "Everybody, this is Kieran. He will be joining us this year. Make sure he feels welcome here". She then handed him back to Maggie.

A few girls, who hadn't already seen him last class, stared at him in shock and amazement. One of them with disgust.

"Alright, now that's out of the way, it's time for..."
11211.title: Phys-Ed

choices: A klutzy girl trips and accidentally falls on top of Kieran.
A goth chick "accidentally" steps on Kieran.
112111.content:
Kieran and Maggie looked at each other nervously. Maggie raised her hand.

"Mrs. Lanovaz?" she called.

"Yes, Maggie" responded Mrs. Lanovaz.

"How are we gonna make sure Kieran doesn't get squished?" asked Maggie.

Mrs. Lanovaz ponders for a moment. "How about we set up two lanes? One for Kieran and one for the rest of you" she said.

The rest of the class nodded. Kieran nodded too as, to him, it sounded like a solid plan. Maggie, however, was unsure.

"Shouldn't he just sit down and let us do this" she asked. "Someone could trip and fall into his lane".

"Maggie! Kieran did not come to school to sit around and do nothing. He will do his part. The same as everyone else, understood?"

Maggie sighed in defeat, but Kieran gave her a reassuring look.

"Don't worry about me" he said. "I'll be fine".

The class stands at the starting position, ready to start running. Mrs. Lanovaz blows and the whistle and off they go.

Does something happen?
112111.title: Run to the Hills

choices: He wakes up in a hospital bed.
He wakes up in another class with Maggie looking down at him.
1121111.content:
Suddenly, Kieran saw a massive shadow overhead and turned around to see a girl with brown hair and blue eyes falling directly above him.

Momo: https://preview.redd.it/111yabljl6n51.jp...

"Ugh, shit" he said, right before being squished underneath the girl's chest.

"Ow" said the girl, getting up. As she got up, she noticed Kieran and gasped. "Oh my god, I'm so sorry!!! Are you okay?!!!" she asked, afraid of hurting the little man. Kieran tried getting up, but couldn't.

"O-Ow! I-I think my left l-leg is broken" he said, sitting there with a nosebleed, unable to get up.

She starts tearing up. "I'm so sorry".

Maggie and Mrs. Lanovaz notice Kieran and the girl talking and approach them.

"Momo! What happened?!" asked Mrs. Lanovaz.

"I tripped and fell, not realizing the poor little guy was infront of me. He got squished and..." she trailed off before sobbing into her hands.

"Hey. D-Don't feel bad" said Kieran. "Y-You didn't mean to". He then blacked out from the pain.

Maggie sighed before gently picking Kieran up. "I'll get him to the school nurse and ask her what to do" she said.
1121111.title: Klutzy Momo

1121112.content:
Kieran sees a shadow overhead and turns around to see an enormous foot coming down upon him. He screams, but it's too late as he is squished by the massive shoe.

Alicia lifted her foot of him and screamed, pretending to be horrified. "Oh my god!! I'm so sorry!! Are you okay?!" she said. The truth was that she stepped on him on purpose. She thought he was an ugly pervert who came to their school to spy on girls, which wasn't the case.

Mrs. Lanovaz and Maggie rushed over to see what happened. Kieran lay flat on the ground, passed out.

"Alicia, what happened?" asked Mrs. Lanovaz.

"I'm sorry, Mrs. Lanovaz" she lied. "I wasn't watching where I was going and accidentally stepped on him".

"You should have been more careful, young lady" said Lanovaz. "That's a week of detention for you".

"A week?!" she protested. "But it was an accident!!".

"Whether or not it was an accident doesn't matter. You could've possible killed Kieran and that is unacceptable. I expect you to go to detention at lunch as well as after school"

"Okay" groaned Alicia, walking away.

Mrs. Lanovaz gently picked Kieran up on the ground and turned to Maggie, handing her the unconscious body. "Maggie, take Kieran to the Nurse's office immediately" she said.

"Sure thing, Mrs. Lanovaz" she said, taking Kieran and heading out the door.

When Kieran wakes up...
1121112.title: An Accident

1121113.content:
After that lesson was over they had a free period. Maggie took Kieran to a table and they chatted. “Do you like anime?” She asks him placing her huge head in front of Kieran on the table “umm I never really watched any” he told her “ooh then you can watch then all with me!” She said
She took out her laptop and placed Kieran gently in between her plump tits. They watched an anime with a giantess called Diane in it, next lesson they had a supply so they kept watching it at the back of the class.
“Diane’s my favourite character” she told him “hey why don’t I cosplay her and you can dress as a tiny little man!?” She giggles excitedly “umm I never really liked the idea of cosplay” he said “it seems kinda geeky”
She slammed her fist in the table “hey! You’re my pet now, you do what I want!”
“Don’t think you can boss me around cause im small!”
“As punishment for being a naughty pet you’re going to spend the rest of the two hour lesson in my......
1121113.title: Everything goes fine.

choices: She gives in to temptation and swallows him.
11211132.content:
"...In my mouth!" said Maggie.

"Nononono wait! I'm sorry" yelled Kieran, to no avail as Maggie parted her lips and tossed the tiny boy into her mouth, her warm breath surrounding him. Kieran was terrified of this place. As Maggie's lips closed, Kieran felt a sense of dread come over him. He looked around this pink cave. Her slimy tongue was slippery. He couldn't stand. Her massive teeth loomed around him, threatening to chomp him into bits. The back of her throat loomed ominously before him. A path of no return, down into Maggie's belly. It terrified him. His little sister had tried to eat him many times. All of which were stopped by his mother, of course. All of those experiences left Kieran with a bit of trauma.

Suddenly, her tongue began moving, tossing Kieran around. He screamed, although nobody but Maggie could hear him. She giggled at his pleas for help. She wasn't planning on swallowing him. Not at all. Just tasting him. He DID taste very good though. She beat him against the roof of her mouth repeatedly and it was getting harder and harder to resist swallowing him.
11211132.title: Maggie's Mouth

choices: She goes to the bathroom and barfs him out.
She leaves him in there and digests him.
112111321.content:
Inside her mouth, Kieran was screaming for help. It was terrifying. Eventually, she stopped moving her tongue. For a moment, everything was completely still. Suddenly, he felt Maggie tilting her head back. He felt his legs being sucked down her throat. Then came the inevitable sound.

*GULP*

Maggie swallowed her tiny pet, now her tiny snack down her throat. She could feel him struggling all the way down. He had tasted so good. Like chicken. She patted her stomach, feeling him land inside of it.

Kieran was squeezed down a tight, fleshy tube called the esophagus, all the way down to his doom. He squirmed with all his strength, but to no avail. Eventually, he was dropped into the large, slimy, acidic cave of Maggie's belly. Groans and gurgles welcomed him as the stomach accepted Kieran as its new meal. The pH level stung Kieran's nostrils. He swam over to the stomach walls and pounded with all his might.

"MAGGIE!!! PLEASE!!! LET ME OUT!!!! I DON'T WANNA DIE!!! I'M NOT FOOD!!!!! PLEASE!!!! HELP ME!!!!!" he screamed. He heard her giggling on the outside.

Does she let him out?
112111321.title: She gives in to temptation and swallows him.

1122.content:
"I'd rathe-" Kieran starts to say.

"I'm so excited to have my very own shrunken pet" she says, cutting him off.

"B-But I-" he retorts.

"No buts" she says. "Well, except maybe this butt". She points to her own butt, giggling.

"Maggie! I'm happy you and Kieran are getting along, but could you please focus on the lesson" says the teacher.

"Yes, ma'am" she says.

Soon, class is over and it's time for...
1122.title: No Choice

choices: The class goes on as normal
113.content:
A blond girl sitting in the back of the class raises her hand gently. "I-I'll take him" she said, nervously.

"Alright then, Emily. He's all yours" said Mrs. Brown, before taking Kieran over to her. She placed Kieran down on the desk and then went back to the front of the class, beginning their lesson for today.

"H-Hi. M-My n-n-name is E-Emily" she said. "I-It's n-n-nice to m-meet you, K-Kieran".

Kieran smiled, reassured. This girl seemed absolutely harmless. She couldn't hurt a fly, which to her, he probably was.

"I-It's nice to meet you too, Emily" he replied.
113.title: Two Anxious Beans

choices: Emily needs to use the bathroom
1132.title: Something happens

choices: She goes to the bathroom with no problems.
11321.content:
Emily raises her hand. "Uh, M-Mrs. Brown" she said. "I have to go to the bathroom".

Mrs. Brown sighed. "Alright, but bring Kieran with you. I don't wish to leave him unsupervised".

"O-Okay" she said.
11321.title: Emily needs to use the bathroom

choices: Her girly girl best friend Alissa
113211.content:

info.brief_description: A tiny man is forced to go to an all-girl school. What could go wrong?
info.description:
Please add more chapters to this story. I am not nearly creative enough to write all of this on my own. I'll give 100 GP for new chapters.

Summary
Your name is Kieran McLoughlin. A 17 year old man with a rare birth condition that caused him to be only two inches in height. His parents forced him to go to an all-girl school, under the pretense that girls wouldn't be as rough as guys would.

Rules
1. No male giants.
2. No futas.
3. No furries.
4. No growing, expansion, transformation or anything like that.
5. Keep it in third person.
6. No other tinies.
7. No bad grammar.
8. Don't kill off Kieran unless you plan to end the story there. No changing tinies.
9. No scat/piss.
10. No excessive farting. Smells are okay, but nothing too over the top.
11. No one-liner chapters. If you're going to add a chapter, make sure you add at least a 4-5 sentence paragraph.
12. No doll-play shit or crossdressing.
13. No animals!

Guidelines
Kieran is a young, socially awkward teenager who's been homeschooled for most of his life. He doesn't really know how to talk to people, let alone girls. Please try to stay in-continuity with that fact. Thank you!
info.pretty_title: Tiny in an All-Girls School (PLEASE ADD)
